niagara.optimizer.rules
Class ParsedRule

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Rule
      niagara.optimizer.rules.ParsedRule
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructedRule, SimpleRule
public abstract class ParsedRule
extends Rule

A simple rule which maps (exactly) one logical operator to one initializable operator.
